headline: Trump and Harris Agreed to a September Debate
description: Donald Trump held a news conference proposing debate dates after Kamala Harris became the Democratic nominee, with ABC News set to host a debate on Sept. 10.
newsletter_headline: Trump and Harris Agreed to a September Debate
newsletter_sub_hed: Also, Ukraine launched a surprise push into Russia. Here’s the latest at the end of Thursday.

headline: Ukraine launched a surprise push into Russia
description: Ukrainian forces breached Russian border defenses, capturing several settlements in an unexpected attack that led to a state of emergency in Russia's Kursk region.

headline: Mortgage rates dropped sharply
description: The average rate for a 30-year mortgage fell to 6.47 percent, marking the biggest one-week decline of the year and the lowest in 15 months, providing relief for buyers and potential sellers.

headline: Inside Sudan’s civil war

headline: Sydney McLaughlin-Levrone made a world record look easy
description: Sydney McLaughlin-Levrone of the U.S. set a world record time of 50.37 seconds in the 400-meter hurdles final at the Paris Olympics, earning her a second consecutive gold medal in the event.
